content:
[list]      [*][url=#what]What games/software can I create guides for?[/url][/*]      [*][url=#where]Where do I find guides that I created?[/url][/*]      [*][url=#content]Are there guidelines for what can and can't be included in guides?[/url][/*]  [/list]

[h3][url id=what][/url]What games/software can I create guides for?[/h3]You can create a guide for any game or software that you have in your Steam Library.


[h3][url id=where][/url]Where do I find guides that I created?[/h3]There are two ways you can locate guides that you've created:

From your Steam Community profile:
[olist]      [*]In the Steam Community, go to your profile. (Click your name select "View my profile"[/*]      [*]In the right column, you will see a list of links. Click on "Guides" to view your guides.[/*]  [/olist]
From the 'guides' section for a specific game/software:

[olist]      [*]In the community hub for a game or software, click the "Guides" tab[/*]      [*]In the right column, you will see a section for "Your Guides" and a link to "Guides you've made"[/*]  [/olist]
[h3][url id=content][/url]Are there guidelines for what can and can't be included in guides?[/h3]For more information on this please click [url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/6862-8119-C23E-EA7B]here[/url] to read the full Rules and Guidelines for Steam Guides.

You can also find more information on guides here: [url=http://www.steamcommunity.com/guides]http://www.steamcommunity.com/guides[/url]
title: Steam Guides
